How many people are affected by enlarged parietal foramina ?,"The prevalence of enlarged parietal foramina is estimated to be 1 in 15,000 to 50,000 individuals.",GHR,enlarged parietal foramina
What are the genetic changes related to enlarged parietal foramina ?,"Mutations in the ALX4 gene account for 60 percent of cases of enlarged parietal foramina and mutations in the MSX2 gene account for 40 percent of cases. These genes provide instructions for producing pro
